body:
This error message is not entirely nonsensical:

```powershell
(0)[ , (, 0) ] -EQ $NULL
```

However, I do not think trying to cast the string to an integer is a reasonable step here.  Like we are asked for a whale’s trunk, so we try to cast the whale to an elephant.
Note that it's not actually trying to convert the `string` here, it's trying to convert `object[]` to `int` and just writing the wrong message.

Another repro:

## Steps

```powershell
@()[(Get-Item .)]
''[(Get-Item .)]
```

## Expected

```powershell
PS> @()[(Get-Item .)]
InvalidArgument: Cannot convert the "C:\" value of type "System.IO.DirectoryInfo" to type "System.Int32".

PS> ''[(Get-Item .)]
InvalidArgument: Cannot convert the "C:\" value of type "System.IO.DirectoryInfo" to type "System.Int32".
```

## Actual

```ps1
PS> @()[(Get-Item .)]
InvalidArgument: Cannot convert the "System.Object[]" value of type "System.Object[]" to type "System.Int32".

PS> ''[(Get-Item .)]
InvalidArgument: Cannot convert the "" value of type "System.String" to type "System.Int32".
```

---

Basically the error is reporting that it's trying to convert the `Target` expression rather than the `Index` expression.  Type conversion tracing shows that the correct conversion path is attempted though and it's an error message issue only:

```powershell
pwsh -nop { Trace-Command -Name TypeConversion { & { ''[[IO.DirectoryInfo]::new('c:\')] } 2>$null }  -PSHost }

DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9664 TypeConversion Information: 0 : Looking for "op_Implicit" cast operator.
DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9677 TypeConversion Information: 0 :     Cast operator for "op_Implicit" not found.
DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9683 TypeConversion Information: 0 :     Looking for "op_Explicit" cast operator.
DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9688 TypeConversion Information: 0 :         Cast operator for "op_Explicit" not found.
DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9693 TypeConversion Information: 0 :         Looking for "op_Implicit" cast operator.
DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9700 TypeConversion Information: 0 :             Cast operator for "op_Implicit" not found.
DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9705 TypeConversion Information: 0 :             Looking for "op_Explicit" cast operator.
DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9709 TypeConversion Information: 0 :                 Cast operator for "op_Explicit" not found.
DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9713 TypeConversion Information: 0 :                 Fail to figure out the conversion from "System.IO.DirectoryInfo" to "System.Int32"
DEBUG: 2021-11-02 10:35:50.9724 TypeConversion Information: 0 :                 Type Conversion failed.
```
